item.title: DSA - Adjacency List
item.description: What is an Adjacency List? An Adjacency List helps store a list of connections between each vertex in a finite graph. Vertex Connects with 0 1 1 0, 2, 3 2 1, 3 3 1, 2 Implementation The addEdge method takes vertices as input and adds an edge to the adjacency list. In this example, the adjacency list is represented as a dictionary that maps vertices to a set of all connected vertices.
